tips.content: Yes, you can do it! You have enough willpower to avoid that food.
Just think that you'll need to run at least one hour in order to burn the calories in that food.
You want to feel even more sexy and attractive so badly - you want it much more than that food.
Think about all the weight you have already lost - you definitely want your weight chart to keep going down!
Anything is possible once you set your mind to it - and when you want to lose weight, this is twice as right!
Just imagine that you're a movie star or a supermodel. You have to look your best and avoid temptations!
Do you really need that food? Eat only what you need and only when you are hungry.
Just hold yourself back for a couple of minutes - the craving will go away.
Even if the food in front of me is delicious and terribly tempting, I can say 'no' and it won't kill me.
You've got nothing to lose by staying away from that piece of cake, except added pounds.
It's your choice whether to stay on track - make the right decision!
Start eating and thinking like a thin person - that's nothing but some uninteresting food.
Sorry food, you are not the center of my life! I can and I will live better without eating you.
You've been getting slimmer every day, and you want things to continue that way!
Just think how good you feel when the number on the scale is lower - it's worth avoiding temptations!
You'll feel so bad after eating - now, you can still make the choice to avoid that feeling!
Your body is beautiful, and it will become more beautiful each day.
You only need to have self control a couple of times - it will become easier and more natural. Practice it this time.
Just go away from the temptation, go to another room or farther, leave your house or wherever you are.
Your weight loss group will be so disappointed if you haven't lost weight this week.
Think about all the proud people who became so confident when they lost weight. Do you want to be one of them?
Imagine the "Wow!", the surprised faces of people who have not seen you for a long time - so control that craving!
Imagine that the food you're craving is just so unhealthy and dangerous for your body that you should avoid it for medical reasons.
How do you want to look on the day when you surprisingly meet the man of your dreams?
Imagine you are invited to the Oscar ceremony. How do you want to look when you walk down the red carpet?
Would you eat that if you were Scarlett Johansson or Megan Fox? Probably not!
You'll be so satisfied and proud after controlling yourself!
It's so easy to avoid temptations - just don't reach over for that food!
When you look in the mirror, what will you see? Will it be a stronger and slimmer woman?
Quickly try to find something healthy and low calorie to eat. Fill yourself up with vegetables.
Make a commitment to wait 15 minutes. It's easier. During those 15 minutes, eat tons of veggies and drink 3 glasses of water.
Think how easy and fun it will be to buy new clothes, any clothes you like - they will all look great on you!
No more black outfits - you will even be able to wear those tight, white clothes! So - control yourself.
Can you keep your hands busy with something? Knitting, playing computer games?
Take a bubble bath - it's a win-win!
Take a deep breath and go for a 5 minute walk (only 5 minutes - it's not that hard).
Everyone deserves to look and feel their best - you also deserve to!
It's your turn to win! Just continue playing by the rules of the weight loss game!
You'll do whatever it takes to achieve your goal, and yes - that means avoiding unhealthy foods!
Just let loose the winner inside you. Don't shut yourself down with negative talk!
Make other people believe losing weight is easy by making it easy for you - eat only what you need.
Eating unhealthy foods, and even binge-eating may cause stress
Commit to giving yourself the best life that you can. Do it for YOU and your body!
You simply must do it for your body.
Envision your future. What would you ultimately like your life to be like?
Imagine every detail of your body and how it will look when you're thin.
Life goes where you choose to take it. What direction do you choose?
You can do this. It's not easy, but the reward will be well worth it.
Focus on how you can avoid that food instead of how you can't.
Those fried potatoes will clog your arteries and make you fat. But those fruits and veggies look delicious and refreshing, and will help you lose that weight!
Everybody has will power, and the more you exercise it, the stronger it gets!
That cake is just a lot of sugar, flour and eggs - that's all. What's so good about it?
Look at some photos of fit people.
You'll feel younger when you're slimmer.
Read some weight loss success stories!
Watch the 'Biggest Loser'!
Don't settle for less than you deserve.
Do you have emergency foods at hand? Cut veggies? Low-cal soup and popcorn? A delicious salad?
It's never too late to lose weight - you can do it!
Don't think "I can never resist" - resist this time and break the vicious cycle of "never."
Avoiding foods like these will make your life longer!
You have the power inside you - learn what works best for you to help stay away from bad foods.
Think of all the models with the tailored clothes that fit them perfectly. You want clothes to look like that on you, too.
Imagine yourself running airily through a field.
Remember how you want to look - look at your motivational photos.
Which parts of your body do you least like? Imagine how they will look after you lose weight.
Think of the slender people you know, with the toned bodies - the ones that make you feel jealous. You can be one of them, too.
After you lose weight, people will turn their heads to look at you in the street - it'll be so much fun.
Your self-confidence will improve so much when you're slimmer.
There are so many good reasons not to eat that food, but there's not even one good reason to eat it.
Happiness is achieving long-term, significant goals. Eating this food will hurt your happiness.
This food will give you slight enjoyment for a very short period of time, and much frustration in the long run.
Think about a flat belly, firm buttocks and toned arms.
Just a little self-discipline... remember your goal - you're totally on the right path.
Your friends who've lost weight are now walking proudly, holding their heads high. You surely want to feel that way, too.
You won't miss  anything by avoiding sweets - your  life will be much better without them.
Imagine getting rid of all the fat in your thighs. It'll be worth it!
Engage yourself with your preferred hobby, it will help remove your thoughts from the cravings
Imagine everyone at the party is staring at you because you look so great after losing all that weight!
Eating may be temporarily satisfying, but ultimately, will leave you with the unpleasant feelings you started out with.
Promise to yourself to eat that food only after you drink two full glasses of water.
Prove to yourself that you can do it! You can control yourself - it is all in your mind!
Remember that eating healthy is your new lifestyle.
You can eat whatever you want or you can be thin - you can't have both!
Obesity is not just about the way you look - it is a life threatening condition!
You did not fail yet! Go back to your routine.
Track your weight again - don't regain weight you already lost!
